credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Sepulchral monument for Melchiore Cesarotti, professor in Padua
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, on paper
description:
The monument is shown obliquely. A circular pedestal rises in the center of an oblong rocky base. A female genius stands upon it, her left hand lies upon a cinerary urn, her right holds a laurel wreath. Bowls with flames, supported by swans, flank the pedestal. 

Inscription at the base: 
CESAROTTI.QV/ CIAGE/ E.LA.SUA.GLORIA.VIVE.PER.NOI

In landscape setting. Part of a framing line on top.
name: Drawing
